adrFormatAddress: 1880 Broadway, New York, NY 10023-7500, USA

originalText.text:
Wow, the website worked flawlessly and it’s the first time that I ever paid pre-paid for a parking space. It worked out well I would highly recommend it.
Bill from Bucks County Pennsylvania

originalText.text: I had prebooked my spot here, only to find it's gone with zero help from the attendant. Awful experience.

text.text: I had prebooked my spot here, only to find it's gone with zero help from the attendant. Awful experience.

originalText.text:
Probably the worst parking experience I ever had.
He made us pay a lot (240$) more than expected, changing the reason each time we talked to him. At first he said that we had to pay extra per hour instead of per day, then tripled the price per day and lastly it was because we arrived 28 minutes earlier (we took it back 4 hours before the expected time).
He wasn’t understanding at all and kept telling us that this wasn’t his fault.
We are going to fill a complain and hope to get reparation

originalText.text: I would give zero stars if I could. Paid on Spot Hero and the guy made us pay again when we came to pick up the car. Said that we had to pay each company separately and that we had paid Spot Hero but not them. Absolutely criminal.

text.text: I would give zero stars if I could. Paid on Spot Hero and the guy made us pay again when we came to pick up the car. Said that we had to pay each company separately and that we had paid Spot Hero but not them. Absolutely criminal.

originalText.text:
***COLOMBUS CIRCLE, 330 West 58th Street. GO THERE INSTEAD***

TERRIBLE place. Wouldn't recommended to anyone! I get there AT 10:00 to get the "early bird special" (Saturday, September 8th, so they know who was working), waited for the man until 10:01 (TEN OH ONE), and he says, "Nope, sorry you missed it. Nope can't do anything. No, no sorry, you're late $50." WOW..... So I rushed there, speeding like crazy, just making it, and I get refused. Junk! I am in customer service, I know how to handle people, AND THAT'S NOT THE WAY. So, it goes from $18 to $50 because the guy wasn't there? No thanks. I went on my phone, downloaded the app called Icon GO, typed the 20% coupon code (TAKE20), and found parking, for 12 hours 2 blocks away for $24. THAT PLACE was amazing. Super friendly customer service, joked around, very pleasant. I even tip them! COLOMBUS CIRCLE, 330 West 58th Street. GO THERE INSTEAD!!!
